title: Did Ronald Reagan Warn Against ‘Demagogues’ Willing to Declare a Trade War Against America’s Friends?
subtitle: During a 1988 radio address, President Reagan railed against those calling for trade tariffs and derided protectionism as "a cheap form of nationalism."
author: David Emery
vclaim: President Reagan warned the public against demagogues who advocated a trade war against America's friendly trading partners in the name of protectionism.
